verses.verse: Then there arose a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and of their <S%H802>wives<s%> against their <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

For there <S%H3426>were<s%> that <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1121>"We,<s%> our sons and our <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> are <S%H7227>many.<s%> Let us <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H1715>grain,<s%> that we may <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H2421>live.<s%>"

Some also there <S%H3426>were<s%> that <S%H559>said,<s%> "We are <S%H6148>mortgaging<s%> our <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and our <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and our <S%H1004>houses.<s%> Let us <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H1715>grain,<s%> because of the <S%H7458>famine.<s%>"

There <S%H3426>were<s%> also some who <S%H559>said,<s%> "We have <S%H3867>borrowed<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4060>tribute<s%> using our <S%H7704>fields<s%> and our vineyards as <S%H3754>collateral.<s%>

Yet now our <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is as the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of our <S%H251>brothers,<s%> our <S%H1121>children<s%> as their <S%H1121>children.<s%> <S%H3533>Behold,<s%> we bring into bondage our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and some of our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> have <S%H3426>been<s%> brought into <S%H3533>bondage.<s%> Neither is it in our <S%H410>power<s%> to help <S%H312>it;<s%> for other men have our <S%H7704>fields<s%> and our <S%H3754>vineyards.<s%>"
I was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%> when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H2201>cry<s%> and these <S%H1697>words.<s%>

Then I <S%H4427>consulted<s%> with <S%H3820>myself,<s%> and <S%H7378>contended<s%> with the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> and the <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5383>them,<s%> "You exact <S%H4855>usury,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> of his <S%H251>brother.<s%>" I <S%H5414>held<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> assembly against <S%H6952>them.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1767>them,<s%> "We, after our ability, have <S%H7069>redeemed<s%> our <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were <S%H4376>sold<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and would you even <S%H4376>sell<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and should they be <S%H4376>sold<s%> to <S%H2790>us?<s%>" Then they held their peace, and <S%H4672>found<s%> never a <S%H1697>word.<s%>

Also I <S%H559>said,<s%> "The thing <S%H1697>that<s%> you <S%H6213>do<s%> is not <S%H2896>good.<s%> Ought you not to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> because of the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> our <S%H341>enemies?<s%>
I <S%H251>likewise,<s%> my brothers and my <S%H5288>servants,<s%> <S%H5383>lend<s%> them <S%H3701>money<s%> and <S%H1715>grain.<s%> Please let us <S%H5800>stop<s%> this <S%H4855>usury.<s%>

Please <S%H7725>restore<s%> to <S%H3117>them,<s%> even this day, their <S%H7704>fields,<s%> their <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> their <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H1004>groves,<s%> and their houses, also the <S%H3967>hundredth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money,<s%> and of the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> the new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> that you are charging <S%H5383>them.<s%>"

Then they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We will <S%H7725>restore<s%> <S%H1245>them,<s%> and will require nothing of <S%H6213>them;<s%> so will we do, even as you <S%H559>say.<s%>" Then I <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and took an <S%H7650>oath<s%> of <S%H6213>them,<s%> that they would do according to this <S%H1697>promise.<s%>

Also I <S%H5287>shook<s%> out my <S%H2684>lap,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "So may <S%H430>God<s%> shake <S%H5287>out<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and from his <S%H3018>labor,<s%> that <S%H6965>doesn't<s%> perform this <S%H1697>promise;<s%> even thus be he shaken <S%H5287>out,<s%> and <S%H7386>emptied.<s%>" All the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>"Amen,<s%>" and <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to this <S%H1697>promise.<s%>

Moreover from the <S%H3117>time<s%> that I was <S%H6680>appointed<s%> to be their <S%H6346>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> from the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> even to the <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> that <S%H8147>is,<s%> twelve <S%H8141>years,<s%> I and my <S%H251>brothers<s%> have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor.<s%>

But the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> who were <S%H6440>before<s%> me were <S%H3513>supported<s%> by the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> from <S%H310>them,<s%> besides <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> even their <S%H5288>servants<s%> <S%H7980>ruled<s%> over the <S%H5971>people:<s%> but I <S%H6213>didn't<s%> do <S%H6440>so,<s%> because of the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H2388>Yes,<s%> also I continued in the <S%H4399>work<s%> of this <S%H2346>wall,<s%> neither <S%H7069>bought<s%> we any <S%H7704>land:<s%> and all my <S%H5288>servants<s%> were <S%H6908>gathered<s%> there to the <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Moreover there were at my <S%H7979>table,<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> and the <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H935>men,<s%> besides those who came to us from among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that were around <S%H5439>us.<s%>

Now that which was <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for one <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1305>choice<s%> <S%H6629>sheep;<s%> also <S%H6833>fowls<s%> were <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for <S%H6235>me,<s%> and once in ten <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7235>store<s%> of all sorts of <S%H3196>wine:<s%> yet for <S%H5973>all<s%> this I <S%H1245>didn't<s%> demand the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor,<s%> because the <S%H5656>bondage<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on this <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> to <S%H430>me,<s%> my God, for <S%H2896>good,<s%> all that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> for this <S%H5971>people.<s%>
